headline: 2 Popular AI Stocks to Sell Before They Drop 24% and 66% in 2025, According to Certain Wall Street Analysts
summary: Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) shares have advanced 34% during the past year, but that upside has been driven almost entirely by valuation multiple expansion rather than earnings growth.  Tim Long at Barclays recently initiated coverage on Apple with a sell rating and a target of $184 per share.  Ryan Brinkman at J.P. Morgan recently reiterated his sell rating on Tesla, and kept his target price at $135 per share.

headline: Could Investing $1,000 in Apple Make You a Millionaire?
summary: Buying and holding Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) has without a doubt been one of the best investment decisions anyone could've ever made.  Today, Apple is a behemoth that carries a market cap of $3.7 trillion and that generated $391 billion in revenue in fiscal 2024.  Apple sells numerous physical products that consumers love.

headline: Best Stock to Buy Right Now: Amazon vs. Apple
summary: Two examples are Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN) and Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL), successful enterprises that touch the lives of billions of people daily.  In the last 12 months, Amazon reported net sales of $620 billion.  E-commerce spending accounts for just 16% of total retail activity in the U.S., so there is a long growth runway that Amazon can capture.
